sent.orig: He cleans the car once a week, a fortnight, etc, ie every week, every fortnight, etc.
sent.trans: 他一星期、半月等擦一次车。

sent.orig: This will last me a fortnight.
We arrived safe, at Boston in about a fortnight.
sent.trans: 两周之后，我们平安到达波士顿。

sent.orig: Paraguay, our first opponents in Germany, will not even enter my head for a fortnight.
sent.trans: 巴拉圭是我们在德国的第一个对手，但他们在这14天里不会在考虑之列。

sent.orig: Maker make trial product exactly conform specification expect completion within fortnight.
sent.trans: 厂家已在试验制造，完全符合所要求的规格，可望在两周内完成。
